entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:36 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Ice fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:37 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:37 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:37 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
